name: NAV KIRAN JANKALYAN SANSTHA
briefDescription: Focussing on girl child, basic education & women empowernment we work within the community to help the people in changing their attitudes and socio-economical conditions through various schemes and initiatives in the fields of education, health awareness & vocational training for providing sustainable income generating avenues in both Urban & Rural areas.We do this by involving the tageted beneficiaries of the community by establishing community development centers for hoilistic development & currently have 31 Community development centres now in Northern India and have been working for welfare of needy by enabling them through various initiatives to bring about awareness, skill development programmes and women empowerment.
